name: Wizard Tower Overture
description:
Wizard Tower Overture
(C) 2015 Harry Trautmann / Metacozm
http://metacozm.com

Description

Enjoy "Wizard Tower Overture" which actually was to be a multi leveled hack'n'slash dungeon game... but due to technical and time constraints it became a 30 second minigame.

Controls

Mouse to look

Left mouse button to hack monsters / interact with moongate and key

ASWD to move (Shift to run)

Space to jump
